Posts.Content: On 1/24/2008 Gsd07 wrote: Anyone out there experiencing higher blood pressure since starting Tamoxifen?   After mastectomy and chemo, I began taking Tamoxifen.  It's giving me very bad hot flashes and night sweats, and I've also noticed an increase in my blood pressure.  So I'm wondering if anyone else has noticed that. I don't need heart problems on top of everything else! Thanks Dear Madame, I have been on tamixifen for a year. I have experienced hot flashes. To take care of that problem, My Doctor put me on a antidepressant EFFEXOR. About a month ago my blood pressure spike and I got a very bad nose blee. My doctors feel that the bleed had nothing to do with my cancer treatment and that i had developed a sensitivty to a cold medicine I took during an international flight.. My pressure is usually 120/20 . It piked to 162/80. the problem only lasted one day. Eveythiing is back to normal now. I hope that this bit of info may help. Regards, DC
